scripts.install-phaser: cd phaser && npm i && cd "../" && npm run install-androidjs-builder
scripts.install-pixi: cd pixi && npm i && cd "../" && npm run install-androidjs-builder
scripts.install-all: npm run install-phaser && npm run install-pixi
scripts.build-phaser: npm run remove-folder-app && cd phaser && npm run build
scripts.build-pixi: npm run remove-folder-app && cd pixi && npm run build
